articles.description: The wing-half, who made more than 400 appearances in the Football League, was diagnosed with Alzheimer's Disease six years ago. He died in Doncaster on Sunday.
articles.content:
Maurice Setters, the former Manchester United player and Republic of Ireland assistant manager, has died aged 83.
The wing-half, who made more than 400 appearances in the Football League, was diagno… [+2758 chars]

articles.title: Andy Walker bemoans Celtic complacency over Rangers threat as he singles out 'the real problem' - Daily Record
articles.description: The former Parkhead star believes his old club now have absolutely no margin for error in the title race.
articles.content:
Andy Walker reckons Celtic have underestimated Rangers for too long.
But the former Parkhead star doesn't expect the club to sack Neil Lennon.
